cookingTips: Slice carrots as thin and uniformly as possible for even cooking and maximum crispness
Pat sliced carrots dry before oiling to ensure crispiness
Bake at low temperature (around 300°F) to dry out rather than bake the chips
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are healthy baked chips. Emphasize the importance of uniform thin slicing for even cooking and explain why low heat dries them out rather than browning them too much.
